ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hey I answered that 3-4 in the morning I Knew it was in game just Couldn t remember where -- Jamie Macdonald A.K.A Magis DarkStone Mercenary Mage Erollisi
ygData.messageBody:
Scott Heine wrote:

> From: "Scott Heine" <heine@...>
>
> Actually, Brad has stated in the past that the Fiery Avenger is given as the
> result of a high level Paladin quest, rather than as the loot of a
> particular monster.
>
> -- Broden McFhï¿½el
> Barbarian Shaman
> Safe Haven Guild
> Bristlebane Server
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Magis [mailto:Magis@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 10:00 PM
> To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] Fiery Avenger
>
> From: Magis <Magis@...>
>
> darien@... wrote:
>
> > From: <darien@...>
> >
> > I actually am hoping that this was a joke... Brad McQuaid is one of the
> > head honchos at Verant. As of yet no one has any information on the
> Fiery
> > Avenger (at least I don't think so). Well, that's all I have to say on
> the
> > subject.
> >
> > Kindira/Kaere/etc...
> >
>
> Its suppose to be IN game Somewhere .. Nafagen's lair I guess .. maybe off
> the
> dragon himself ...
>
> --
>
> Jamie Macdonald
>
> A.K.A
> Magis DarkStone
> Mercenary Mage
> Erollisi Marr
